Nina Derwin is a Brooklyn-based writer with a passion for the art of storytelling. In addition to writing articles for various clients and publications, Nina has written several episodes of scripted television for networks including Starz and Fox.

published yesterday

We independently select these products‚Äîif you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Every now and then you might find yourself wanting to spruce up your kitchen. Or, at the very least, your morning coffee routine. But, sometimes all it takes to refresh your space is bringing home a new mug or two (or three, or four‚Ä¶). More often than not the smallest changes really can make the biggest difference and breathe new life into your decor.

Sound familiar? If so, you‚Äôre in luck, because Target just dropped a whole brand-new line of adorable coffee mugs designed to give your coffee station the makeover it deserves. The best part? They‚Äôre only $5 each. Say goodbye to your sad old discolored mugs and hello to the cute little coffee mugs of your dreams.

Spotted on the shelves of Target is an exciting new assortment of coffee mugs just in time for back-to-school season. Teachers, students, and parents alike can treat themselves to these sweet mugs, which come in so many styles and colors, from a stoneware glaze mug designed to look like icing dripping down along the sides of a donut to abstract prints in bold colors and subtle smiley faces.

Even if you don‚Äôt necessarily need new coffee mugs, these colorful and playful styles double as dopamine decor. You can use them to style a bookshelf, to plant a small succulent or for storage for things like makeup brushes and matches. At just $5 each, they also make a thoughtful gift for your friends heading back-to-school or for your favorite teacher.

‚ÄúOkaaaaay I love the simple donut ones üç©‚Äù wrote one excited Target shopper. ‚ÄúLoving the colors üòç‚Äù wrote another. ‚ÄúCute mugs!! üíó‚Äù commented a third. With so many mugs to choose from, the hardest part about shopping this new collection is trying to decide which ones to add to your cart.

Buy: Room Essentials Stoneware Glaze Mug, $5
